posts.post_content:
$425 shipped - Paypal FF preferred  
email:  lancemoore9@gmail

Here is the ebay link (sorry new to the site and not sure how to post images)

Evers - blue sky Cubs on shirt
Mordecai Brown - Chicago on shirt and Cubs on shirt
Tinker - Bat off, Hands on knees, and Portrait
Lundgren
